attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Loggers are stripping the rain forests of borneo and sumartra and are planting palm oil instead. it is appaling. orangutans, gibbons and many more innocent animals are being killed. it is devistaing. please sign my petition to help save these animals. thank you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
